name: simflow
description: Simply define and run your flows in Chrome

scripts.test: npm run pegjs && mocha --reporter spec --bail --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-ci: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
scripts.no-changes: git diff --exit-code && git diff --cached --exit-code && git ls-files --other --exclude-standard --directory --error-unmatch
